question: A electrician works for 5 weeks every month and for 7 days every week. If he gets paid £125 every day, how much does he earn if he works for a year?
answer:
The electrician works for 7 days every week and works for 5 weeks every month so he works for 7 days/week * 5 weeks/month = <<7*5=35>>35 days/month
If he earns £125 every day he then earns £125/day * 35 days/month = £<<125*35=4375>>4375/month
A year is equal to 12 months so every year he earns £4375/month * 12 months/year = £<<4375*12=52,500>>52,500
#### 52,500
